attributes.action: Make the prime minister resign if the UK votes to leave the European Union
attributes.background:
The PM believes that we are better off inside the European Union. If the population decide he is wrong and vote to leave the EU then is he the best person to oversee our exit? 
If the people decide to leave then our exit should be overseen by a politician who believes we are better off on our own.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
